item.title: 105. Future of Payment & QR Code Technology with Kelvin Li, Head of Platform Tech Business Unit at Ant International Group
item.description:
Discover the technology of QR Code payment by Alipay+ and its journey in becoming a global payment giant! ????


FUMO podcast at 24 Fintech, we are excited to have our guest speaker, Kelvin Li, Head of Platform Tech Business Unit at Ant International Group as he shared insights into Alipay+’s role in expanding digital payments both globally and in the Middle East


Join us as Kelvin delves into how QR code payment technology is driving the future of mobile... Feed: https://anchor.fm/s/7b687e20/podcast/rss

item.title: HN749: Expand Your Network Labs With Containerlab and Clabernetes
item.description: On today’s episode, we cover open source Clabernetes, a tool that allows you to run Containerlab on Kubernetes. Containerlab provides a CLI for orchestrating and managing container-based networking l… Feed: https://feeds.packetpushers.net/packetpushersfatpipe/
